Articles.Content:
When I was looking at the squadcast I saw this in the craft thumbnails picture:

Does this mean that there is another stock craft coming for 1.0?

If not it means that max does not have a save only for squadcast(And that he was messing around in the spacecraft exchange).

When I was looking at the squadcast I saw this in the craft thumbnails picture:

http://i.imgur.com/v27tHXV.png

Does this mean that there is another stock craft coming for 1.0?

If not it means that max does not have a save only for squadcast(And that he was messing around in the spacecraft exchange).

Note how it's only 89 parts too... The plane I built of that size was like 200+ parts, 2/3 of them being in the wings... I can't wait!

...

Max Euphoria Achieved

http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/dragonball/images/9/94/Aww_yeah.png/revision/latest?cb=20130911004635

Note how it's only 89 parts too... The plane I built of that size was like 200+ parts, 2/3 of them being in the wings... I can't wait!

Wait.. Eighty-nine?! How?!

I badly want those wings!

Only 89 parts might mean that there are 2.5 meter engines too!

- - - Updated - - -

I wonder if this will be multi-staged because the other stearwing was, if I remember correctly.

- - - Updated - - -

I think the name is a refence to this http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Airbus_A300
Yeah, noticed it too.

"Only 89 parts"

Challenge Accepted.

I wonder if this will be multi-staged because the other stearwing was, if I remember correctly.

It says 1 stage

Looks awesome though.

It says 1 stage

Looks awesome though.

Think he thought about an larger rapier, larger jet engines would work well enough for me. that is unless the new aero makes us switch to rocket mode much earlier.
It also looks like almost all the fuel is stored in the wings too!

Think he thought about an larger rapier, larger jet engines would work well enough for me. that is unless the new aero makes us switch to rocket mode much earlier.

Even if new aero made us go rocket mode earlier - I think designs will be easier to make. The issue before is that a splane would spend so much time fighting air resistance to reach orbit height. Hopefully once you're in the stratosphere, air resistance is hardly a thing and the mode switch to rocket will be pretty short and sweet.

Ooh, and it has Ã¢â‚¬â€¹airliner-like wings!

I can't wait!!
i fear what Zekes fill make with these:)
Nice! I've pulled off a ~90 part heavy lifter using B9, but stock equivalent was nearer 150. Good to know Squad are scaling up their ambitions in the SSTO arena

Why is everyone so surprised about the size and part count? I had an SSTO that was about 80 parts and a slightly smaller version of Antonov that had about the same part count and size as the new stock craft. Will post pics later as I am on mobile right now.

It doesn't look that big, actually.

EDIT: here it is.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

It has ~90 parts. Couldn't find the SSTO pics but it was MK3 and about the same size if not smaller.

Edited April 20, 2015 by Veeltch
Id love it if they added a bunch of user created craft to the stock game, would be awesome if any of these made it in

Wh- whaaa?

You get CRAFT THUMBNAILS NOW?!?!?!?

Why is everyone so surprised about the size and part count? I had an SSTO that was about 80 parts and a slightly smaller version of Antonov that had about the same part count and size as the new stock craft. Will post pics later as I am on mobile right now.

It doesn't look that big, actually.

EDIT: here it is.

http://imgur.com/a/UhRuV

It has ~90 parts. Couldn't find the SSTO pics but it was MK3 and about the same size if not smaller.

How does this SSTO if it has no rocket engines?
People use stock craft?
Naw I just am a fan of the thumbnails

Looks a lot like Porkjets craft from the DevNote today.

http://i.imgur.com/VG5Aemf.jpg

Looks a lot like Porkjets craft from the DevNote today.

http://i.imgur.com/VG5Aemf.jpg

That is one bizzarre screenshot. Jebediah is freaking out while Bill is having the time of his life. What alternate reality is that from?

Nah, Jeb's not freaking out. Just mildly concerned as to why they're flying peacefully in a horizontal path instead of going to space atop a pillar of flames the way he's used to. How times have changed...

Thats so realistic looking craft that I think they just threw all the old parts into a dumpster.

Btw, heres a "about 100 part" SSTO with ample amount of part clipping on the engine side... Stock parts, FAR aero, 36t cargo. Cargo has about 11 parts aswell.

Looks a lot like Porkjets craft from the DevNote today.

http://i.imgur.com/VG5Aemf.jpg

Counted, that should be around 38 part if there isn't anything special hidden. Assuming the main wings are one part, 4 wheels and the rear elevators to be additional parts.

Edited April 22, 2015 by Temeter
